sentences.en: He was insufferable at times – self-centred and narcissistic.

trans.tran_cn: 自我陶醉的，自恋的，自我崇拜的
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as narcissistic, you disapprove of them because they think about themselves a lot and admire themselves too much
